title: Isolation of mouse thoracic aorta for Western blot
original description: This protocol describes the preparation of aorta samples from mouse for Western blot analysis.
steps:
Sacrifice mouse
1. Sacrifice the mouse by an overdose intraperitoneal injection of sodium pentobarbital.
2. Fix the mouse on the tray, spray with 70% ethanol.

Aorta isolation
3. Open the mouse, dissect the thoracic aorta. Take the lower half portion, rinse in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS).
4. Remove the adventitia (use microscope to guide), rinse in PBS.
5. Blot to dry with a paper towel, quickly transfer to liquid N2 to freeze.

Storage
6. Store at -80ºC until used.
-80temperature
